definition: extending or moving toward a higher place, spatially or metaphorically from a lower to a higher position, raise
details:
adjective
- extending or moving toward a higher place
= synonyms: upward
- open
= example: open
- getting higher or more vigorous
= example: getting higher or more vigorous
= synonyms: improving
- being or moving higher in position or greater in some value
- out of bed
= synonyms: astir
- used up
- (used of computers) operating properly
- (usually followed by `on' or `for') in readiness
adverb
- spatially or metaphorically from a lower to a higher position
= example: spatially or metaphorically from a lower to a higher position
= synonyms: upwards
- to a later time
= example: to a later time
= synonyms: upwards, upward
- to a more central or a more northerly place
= example: to a more central or a more northerly place
- nearer to the speaker
= example: nearer to the speaker
- to a higher intensity
= example: to a higher intensity
verb
- raise
= example: raise
= synonyms: prick
